train.sentence: Programmable DC power supplies regulate the current delivered to the PEMWE stack during steady operation and load steps.
train.label: balance of plant subsystem

train.sentence: Rack-mounted PID controllers orchestrate pumps, heaters, and valves across the balance of plant to keep operating points stable.
train.label: balance of plant subsystem

train.sentence: High-voltage contactors isolate the PEM electrolyzer stack whenever the balance of plant detects an electrical fault.
train.label: balance of plant subsystem

train.sentence: Fast solenoid valves switch purge and coolant loops inside the balance-of-plant manifold within milliseconds.
train.label: balance of plant subsystem

train.sentence: An embedded control computer supervises recipes, alarms, and datalogging for the balance-of-plant subsystems.
train.label: balance of plant subsystem

train.sentence: Type-K thermocouples are mounted across the stack to feed the thermal management loop with real-time temperatures.
train.label: thermal management hardware

train.sentence: Silicone trace heaters wrap exposed manifolds to keep water above freezing during cold starts.
train.label: thermal management hardware

train.sentence: Inline heaters elevate deionized feed water to the stack target temperature within seconds.
train.label: thermal management hardware

train.sentence: The diaphragm pump maintains positive pressure so purified water reaches every cell evenly.
train.label: water supply purification hardware

train.sentence: A PLC-driven fill valve replenishes the reservoir whenever the low-level alarm trips.
train.label: water supply purification hardware

train.sentence: The DI-water filter removes ionic contaminants that would otherwise poison the catalyst.
train.label: water supply purification hardware

train.sentence: Perfluorinated tubing resists metal leaching while routing purified water through the skid.
train.label: water supply purification hardware

train.sentence: The potentiostat/galvanostat exercises single cells to capture polarization curves and degradation signatures.
train.label: measurement and diagnostics instrument

train.sentence: A low-noise lab power supply biases reference electrodes during detailed diagnostic experiments.
train.label: measurement and diagnostics instrument

train.sentence: Four-wire shunt resistors and Hall sensors capture stack current during fast transients.
train.label: measurement and diagnostics instrument

train.sentence: Over-temperature controllers automatically cut heater power when stack hardware exceeds safe limits.
train.label: safety and environmental control device

train.sentence: The cool drive varies blower speed to remove humid hydrogen from the equipment enclosure.
train.label: safety and environmental control device

train.sentence: Bi-metallic strips provide passive cutoff for localized heater blocks in the safety subsystem.
train.label: safety and environmental control device

train.sentence: Redundant level sensors stop the stack if the water reservoir runs low.
train.label: safety and environmental control device

train.sentence: Nafion 212 membranes are thin PFSA films favored for low ohmic resistance in PEMWE stacks.
train.label: proton exchange membrane component

train.sentence: Nafion 117 adds thickness to survive high pressure differentials during long campaigns.
train.label: proton exchange membrane component

train.sentence: Aquivion membranes use short-side-chain PFSA chemistry to balance conductivity and stability.
train.label: proton exchange membrane component

train.sentence: IrO₂ is the workhorse PEMWE anode catalyst enabling fast oxygen evolution.
train.label: anode catalyst layer material

train.sentence: IrRuO₂ blends use ruthenium to enhance kinetics while moderating iridium usage.
train.label: anode catalyst layer material

train.sentence: Pt/C catalyst layers provide high exchange current density for hydrogen evolution.
train.label: cathode catalyst layer material

train.sentence: Emerging Pt-free cathode layers employ transition metal nitrides to slash precious metal content.
train.label: cathode catalyst layer material

train.sentence: Sintered titanium PTLs offer isotropic porosity for reactant transport and mechanical support.
train.label: porous transport layer material

train.sentence: Felt-based titanium PTLs deform slightly to even out contact pressure across the CCM.
train.label: porous transport layer material

train.sentence: Mesh-based titanium PTLs create directional channels that favor gas removal.
train.label: porous transport layer material

train.sentence: Foam-based titanium PTLs maximize surface area for electron conduction and water removal.
train.label: porous transport layer material

train.sentence: Machined titanium bipolar plates resist corrosion in acidic PEMWE environments.
train.label: bipolar plate assembly

train.sentence: Stainless steel bipolar plates are economical but require protective coatings.
train.label: bipolar plate assembly

train.sentence: Nickel-based alloy plates balance conductivity with cost for large PEMWE stacks.
train.label: bipolar plate assembly

train.sentence: Carbon paper GDLs maintain electronic conductivity while venting hydrogen evenly.
train.label: cathode gas diffusion layer

train.sentence: Titanium-based GDLs survive high differential pressure on the cathode side.
train.label: cathode gas diffusion layer

train.sentence: Chronopotentiometry holds current constant to monitor voltage drift during durability studies.
train.label: test or diagnostic protocol

train.sentence: Chronoamperometry fixes voltage while observing current decay to diagnose flooding.
train.label: test or diagnostic protocol

train.sentence: Dynamic load cycling scripts mimic grid-following duty cycles to quantify degradation.
train.label: test or diagnostic protocol

train.sentence: Accelerated stress testing applies extreme swings to reveal weak interfaces quickly.
train.label: test or diagnostic protocol

test.sentence: A modular data acquisition system in the balance-of-plant samples hundreds of temperatures and voltages.
